label: Decision Support Systems
description: This advanced course examines recent developments in information technology for managerial decision support with an emphasis on Internet-based and mobile information technologies. Real-world eases will be used to discuss the application of these technologies to management information systems. 3 undergraduate hours. No graduate credit.
sectionRegistrationNotes: Restricted to Information Sys & Info Tech or Business Process Management major(s) or minor(s). Restricted to students with Junior or Senior class standing.
